trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> that is a composite of the transforms in its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DCollection"></xref>.
Use this class when you want to apply multiple general transforms to single object.
GeneralTransform3DGroup is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup"></xref> class.
GeneralTransform3DGroup is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup"></xref> objects that form this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup"></xref>.
Children is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup"></xref> objects that form this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup"></xref>.
The default is an empty collection.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup.Children*> dependency property.
ChildrenProperty is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
To be added.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Clone is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
CloneCurrentValue is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets the inverse transform of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup"></xref>, if it has an inverse.
The inverse of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup> is created by combining the inverses of its child transforms.
Inverse is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The inverse transform of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DGroup"></xref>, if it has an inverse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Transforms the specified 3-D bounding box to the smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains all the points in the original bounding box.
TransformBounds is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The 3-D bounding box to transform.
The transformed bounding box.
Attempts to transform the specified 3-D point.
TryTransform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The 3-D point to transform.
The result of transforming `inPoint`.
if inPoint was transformed; otherwise, .
